cards.sentenceTarget: El hombre camina por la calle.
cards.sentenceNative: The man walks down the street.

cards.sentenceTarget: La mujer habla con su amiga.
cards.sentenceNative: The woman talks with her friend.

cards.sentenceTarget: El niño juega con la pelota.
cards.sentenceNative: The boy plays with the ball.

cards.sentenceTarget: La niña baila en el jardín.
cards.sentenceNative: The girl dances in the garden.

cards.sentenceTarget: Mi padre trabaja en un banco.
cards.sentenceNative: My father works in a bank.

cards.sentenceTarget: La comida está en la mesa.
cards.sentenceNative: The food is on the table.

cards.sentenceTarget: Siéntate en la silla, por favor.

cards.sentenceNative: Close the door when you leave.
I am cooking in the kitchen.
I have a lot of food at home.

cards.sentenceTarget: Comemos el almuerzo a las dos.

cards.sentenceNative: Let's go to the market together.
I have a lot of work today.
I take the bus every day.

cards.sentenceTarget: El tren sale a las diez.

cards.sentenceNative: Let's go to the cinema tonight.
Add a little bit of salt.
The firefighter puts out the fire.

cards.sentenceTarget: Mayo es el mes de las flores.
cards.sentenceNative: May is the month of flowers.

cards.sentenceTarget: Junio marca el inicio del verano.
cards.sentenceNative: June marks the start of summer.
